AzureBlade: okay... Tell me... how bad am I right now? Please tell me 
the truth...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Starice::
> 
> "They're ok"said Starice altought she didn't know who were them"Let 
> me help you, you need to go to cr."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > AzureBlade, lying on his back, had had his left leg severed. His 
> > armor was near to vaporized completely. His face, however, was the 
> > most horrible of these sights. The left side of it was mauled. 
> > Destroyed circuitry and cables could be seen in the gashes in it.

> where 
> > are they now???
> >

> > >
